# Taxonomy

---

## Taxonomy packages

- [taxize](https://github.com/ropensci/taxize) - Taxonomic toolbelt
- [taxizesoap](https://github.com/ropensci/taxizesoap) - Taxonomic toolbelt (SOAP)
- [ritis](https://github.com/ropensci/ritis) - ITIS client (avail. in taxize)
- [taxizedb](https://github.com/ropensci/taxizedb) - Access to SQL dumps
- [wikitaxa](https://github.com/ropensci/wikitaxa) - Taxonomy from Wiki-pedia/-species/-commons
- [worrms](https://github.com/ropensci/worrms) - WORMS client (avail. in taxize)
- [natserv](https://github.com/ropensci/natserv) - Natureserve client (avail. in taxize)
- [taxa](https://github.com/ropensci/taxa) - Taxonomic classes to be used by other pkgs (coming soon)

# Occurrences

---

## Occurrence packages

- [spocc](https://github.com/ropensci/spocc) - One client to rule them all
- [rgbif](https://github.com/ropensci/rgbif) - GBIF data (avail. in spocc)
- [AntWeb](https://github.com/ropensci/AntWeb) - AntWeb ant data (avail. in spocc)
- [ecoengine](https://github.com/ropensci/taxizedb) - Berekeley Ecoengine client (avail. in spocc)
- [rinat](https://github.com/ropensci/rinat) - iNaturalist client (avail. in spocc)
- [rbison](https://github.com/ropensci/rbison) - USGS BISON client (avail. in spocc)
- [rebird](https://github.com/ropensci/rebird) - eBird data (avail. in spocc)
- [rvertnet](https://github.com/ropensci/rvertnet) - VertNet data (avail. in spocc)
- [rfishbase](https://github.com/ropensci/rfishbae) - Fishbase.org data
